metadata.title: CVE-2023-1235 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to 111.0.5563.64 alloweda remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentiallyexploit heap corruption via a crafted UI interaction. (Chromium securityseverity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
